scripts.build: git checkout main && cp .env.development .env.local && next build && next export
scripts.production: git checkout production && cp .env.production .env.local && next build && next export -o prod
scripts.deploy:production: yarn production && pushd prod && aws --region us-east-1 s3 sync --delete . s3://timer-20210220173156-hostingbucket-production --exclude '*.DS_Store' --cache-control public,max-age=604800 && popd
